Niamh.gae0:
A Níamh Cínn-Óir,
banphrionsa Tír na nÓg,
a chara
Niamh.eng0:
Black Molly:
Níamh Cínn-Óir,
princess of Tír na nÓg,
 o friend
Niamh.gae1:
Mallaidh Dubh, abair liom, 
 cad atá cearr?
Niamh.eng1:
Níamh Cínn-Óir: 
Black Molly, tell me, 
 what is wrong?
Niamh.eng2:
Black Molly: 
A bad omen of our druids
Niamh.eng3:
Níamh Cínn-Óir:
 Doom? Despair?
Name our enemy.
Niamh.gae4:
Ironkey a thugan sé ar féin.
Lord, a glaonn slúite ar.
Niamh.eng4:
Black Molly: 
'Ironkey, he calls himself. 
Legions call him Lord.
Niamh.eng5:
Níamh Cínn-Óir: 
I will face him .

Douglas_Hyde.eng0:
Black Molly: 
Douglas, Hero of Ireland.
Douglas_Hyde.gae2:
Ironkey, lena mheaisíní, 
ag máirseáil ar ríocht na Sióga.
Douglas_Hyde.eng2:
Black Molly: 

Ironkey, with his machines, 
marches on the Fairy Underworld.
Douglas_Hyde.eng3:
Douglas Hyde: 
Ironkey? Small, contemptible creature.
Douglas_Hyde.gae5:
Bailaigh  Óglaigh.
 Rachfaidh mé sa tóir ar.
Douglas_Hyde.eng5:
Douglas Hyde: 
gather Volunteers. 
I shall hunt him.

Oisin.gae0: Tá Tír na nÓg faoi ionsaí!
Oisin.eng0:
Black Molly: 
Tír na nóg is under attack!
Oisin.gae2:
Tá dul chun cinn gan staonadh, 
ag Tiarna Ironkey agus a meaisíní 
ifrinniúla.
Oisin.eng2:
Black Molly: 
Lord Ironkey advances relentlessly
 with his infernal machines.
Oisin.gae5:
Cruinnímís 
laochra na hÉireann 
chun ár thaobh.
Oisin.eng5:
Oisín:
Let us rally 
the champions of Ireland 
to our side.

Sirriam.gae0:
A Alexander ar deireadh! 
Táim fillte ón gcath thíos.
Sirriam.eng0:
Black Molly:
Alexander at last! 
I have returned from the battle below.
Sirriam.gae2:
Creachann meaisíní 
agus arrachtaigh Ironkey
na híseal-ríocht.
Sirriam.eng2:
Black Molly: 
Ironkey's machines and monsters 
ravage the low kingdoms.
Sirriam.eng3:
Alexander Nicolson: 
Let us send for aid.
Sirriam.eng4:
Black Molly: 
Help from the mortal realm?

Mug_Ruith.eng1:
Mug Ruith:
Black Molly, 
I sense your presence.
Mug_Ruith.gae2:
A saoi, 
Ní seasfaidh
Tír na nÓg 
i gcoinne acmhainn cogaíochta Ironkey.
Mug_Ruith.eng2:
Black Molly:
O Sage
Tír na nÓg 
can't stand 
against Ironkey's war capacity.

Abhartach.gae1:
Mallaidh Dubh, 
agus fatíos uirthi. 
Ag lorg cúnamh uaimse?
Abhartach.eng1:
Abhartach: 
Black Molly, 
full of fear. 
Seeking aid from me?
Abhartach.gae2:
A Thaoiseach doracha, 
tá Ironkey, lena meaisíní 
agus arrachtaigh, 
ag máirseáil i leith 
le huacht cearnóir.
Abhartach.eng2:
Black Molly: 
O dark Chieftain, 
Ironkey, with his machines and monsters, 
marchs hither with the will of a conqueror.
Abhartach.eng3:
Abhartach: 
Ironkey! 
A formidable foe indeed!
Abhartach.gae4:
conas is féidir linn 
a ionsaí a sheasamh?
Abhartach.eng4:
Black Molly: 
How we may withstand 
his onslaught?

Fionn.gae2:
An feidir cúnamh a lorg 
ó laochra na hÉireann?
Fionn.eng2:
Black Molly:
Can we seek help from the champions
 of Ireland?
Fionn.gae3: Pah. Tugfaidh mise bata agus bóthar dó.
Fionn.gae4: An féidir glaoch ar na Fianna?
Fionn.eng4:
Black Molly:
May we summon the champions of Ireland?

Pooka.gae0:
Iolchrothach aosta
an bhfuil tú ann?
Pooka.eng0:
Black Molly:
ancient shapeshifter 
are you there?
Pooka.eng2:
Black Molly:
The lowerkingdoms have fallen.
Pooka.gae4:
Cad é sin?  Tá laochra na hÉireann 
sa tobair?
Pooka.eng4:
Black Molly: What's that? The champions of Ireland 
 are in the well?

Fand.eng0:
Black Molly:
Oh vast, terrible ocean
 I entreet upon you!
Fand.gae1:
Seachain, Mallaidh Dubh,
ná glaoigh ar an farraige go baoth
Ar dthánaigh tú gan tairiscint?
Fand.eng1:
Beware, Black Molly,
Aid from Manannan is not sought lightly
Fand.gae3:
ná bí búrtha,
 Chuideoidh mé leat. Gheoidh muid rud éigint oirrúnach
ó gach cúige.
Lean mé!
Fand.eng3:
but don't fret, 
I'll help you get it, a token from each province. 
follow me!
Fand.gae4: Leanfaidh mé thú, Fand na dáimhe.
Fand.eng4:
Black Molly:
Lead on, o muse.
